Title: The Sky Crawlers
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Family, Sci-Fi
Writer: Hiroshi Mori (story and characters), Chihiro Itô (adaptation)
Actors: Rinko Kikuchi, Ryô Kase, Shôsuke Tanihara, Megumi Yamaguchi
Plot: The Kildren, a group of eternally young fighter pilots, experience the sudden loss of innocence as they battle the enemy in astonishing dogfights above the clouds.
